name: Xue Huang (ASSETS)
description:
"I did not choose to be who I am. If I had the choice, I wish to be born normally and die normally. The legends always say that a phoenix is loved by the gods because its immortal. Every time it dies, it always rise up stronger and wiser. No one ever thought of how painful it is to burn before rising from its own ashes... "

- 血凰 (xue huang)

血凰 (xue huang) is the reincarnation of the Phoenix Queen who was born in a small village, but abandoned by the villagers due to her demonic red hairs and eyes. She was raised in a cave located in the middle of the forest by 小凤 (xiao feng) the phoenix sword spirit that lives inside the pendant that she worn since birth. 

Please keep in mind that this is only the character design and animations demo with no actual gameplay

Player Controls:

Movement - AD or arrows

Jump - Space Bar

Attack One - 1

Attack Two - 2

Throw Attack - 3
